title: Mother
body:
Hello dear.
<<if visited("Flowerperson.GiveFlowers")>>
    [[Mother.TakeFlowers]]
<<else>>
    I'm waiting for a few flowers from the flowershop.
    Could you go and get them for me?
    It's just in the Southwest,
    you can't miss if if you follow the path.
<<endif>>

title: Mother.TakeFlowers
body:
<<if !visited("Mother.TakeFlowers")>>
    I see you have the Flowers.
    Thank you, you realy helped us there.
<<else>>
    Thank you for helping us out earlier,
    those flowers have healing powers.
    My child and me will soon be able to sleep again.
<<endif>>
